short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to Shopify theme resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make managing your store faster and easier with Quick Admin Links, the must-have Chrome extension for merchants and developers. Seamlessly access admin and theme customizer links for the page you're currently viewing, directly from your browser toolbar.

Key Features:
🔗 Instant Admin Access: Navigate to relevant admin pages without searching through menus.
🎨 Theme Customizer Links: Open the theme editor for any page in just one click.
⚡ Time-Saving Tool: Eliminate repetitive navigation and focus on managing your store efficiently.
🔐 Secure & Private: Operates locally in your browser, ensuring your data stays safe.

Who’s It For?
Merchants: Streamline store management and customization.
Developers: Save time during development and testing.
Simplify your workflow and keep your store running smoothly with Quick Admin Links.
